parts.text:
```json
{
"application": "Snakemake",
"other_software": [
"SLURM",
"Intel MPI",
"OpenMP"
],
"resource_requirements": {
"nodes": 1,
"tasks": 1,
"wallclock_time": "12:00:00",
"memory": "10G",
"cpus_per_task": 32,
"partition": "skylake-himem"
}
}
```

This script utilizes the Snakemake workflow management system, orchestrated through the SLURM workload manager. It also leverages Intel MPI for parallel execution and OpenMP for multi-threading within individual tasks. The script configures resource allocation through SLURM directives, requesting a single node with 32 CPUs and 10GB of memory on the "skylake-himem" partition. It sets up Intel MPI pinning for optimal performance and defines the execution command for Snakemake using `mpirun`.
